title: Issue Permit for Hot Work
description: An operations supervisor needs to issue a permit to work for a maintenance crew performing welding (hot work) inside a process unit.

tasks.description: Create a new permit to work request, specifying the location, work type (hot work), and duration.
tasks.expected_outcome: A draft permit is created in the system.

tasks.description: Verify that all safety prerequisites are met, such as gas testing, fire watch assignment, and equipment isolation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms all safety checks on the checklist are complete.

tasks.description: Approve and issue the electronic permit, making it active for the specified shift.
tasks.expected_outcome: The permit is officially issued and visible to the work crew and control room.
